mapper.insert: insert into tb_employee(employee_id, employee_name, employee_age, employee_gender, employee_card_number, employee_card_img, employee_face_img, employee_phone, position_type, employee_create_time, employee_leave_time) values (#{employeeId}, #{employeeName}, #{employeeAge}, #{employeeGender}, #{employeeCardNumber},#{employeeCardImg}, #{employeeFaceImg}, #{employeePhone}, #{position.positionId}, #{employeeCreateTime}, #{employeeLeaveTime})
mapper.select: select e.employee_id, e.employee_name, e.employee_age, e.employee_gender, e.employee_card_number, e.employee_card_img, e.employee_face_img, e.employee_phone, e.employee_create_time, e.employee_leave_time, p.position_id, p.position_name, p.position_basic_salary, p.position_note from tb_employee e left join tb_position p on e.position_type = p.position_id where e.employee_id = #{employeeId};
select employee_id, employee_name, face_img from tb_employee
